author: slessard
msg: ADFFACES-49 patch. It enables :required, :disabled and :read-only state modifiers to all input selectors. Two aliases were also added in simple skin: .AFRequiredContent:alias and .AFRequiredLabel:alias

author: markt
msg: Port fix for bug 34399 - disable the undeploy option if the webapp has not been 'deployed'
This occurs, for example, if the webapp is defined in server.xml
